lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the April 3 ousting of Prime Minister Anibal Cavaco Silva's government could slow economic reforms and investment as Portugal continues to adapt to membership in the European Community, which it joined in January last year, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brokers and unit trust managers said the recent surge in economic confidence under the PSD rule was still largely underpinned by continuing optimistic forecasts.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The economy has developed a certain self-confidence that is now less dependent on the political situation," said Fritz Haser, economics professor at Universidade Livre, Lisbon.
